rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现十月出生的孩子接种疫苗后感染流感的可能性较小研究表明，十月是幼儿接种流感疫苗的最佳月份，符合疾病预防控制中心的指导方针，以最大限度地预防季节性流感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Study-finds-October-born-kids-less-likely-to-catch-flu-post-vaccination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Study-finds-October-born-kids-less-likely-to-catch-flu-post-vaccination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46015c90-bf29-473c-85f3-8be2b6076ee4 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 18:07:00 -0500 Study finds October-born kids less likely to catch flu post-vaccination
糖尿病患者使用格列酮药物与降低原发性和继发性脑癌风险相关布里斯托大学领导的一项新研究发现，与服用其他药物的糖尿病患者相比，长期服用抗糖尿病药物（称为格列酮）的糖尿病患者患原发性和继发性脑癌的风险较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Glitazone-drug-use-by-diabetic-病人-关联-with-lower-risk-of-primary-and-secondary-brain-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Glitazone-drug-use-by-diabetic-病人-关联-with-lower-risk-of-primary-and-secondary-brain-cancer.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f01135e-92a1-4236-9277-ea74c1da0200 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 14:23:38 -0500 Glitazone drug use by diabetic patients associated with lower risk of primary and secondary brain cancer
突破性研究揭示 1 型糖尿病中的 β 细胞动力学全球约有 800 万人患有 1 型糖尿病 (T1D)，这是一种慢性自身免疫性疾病，身体攻击并破坏胰腺中自身产生胰岛素的 β 细胞（发音为“β”），导致胰岛素缺乏和无法调节血糖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Breakthrough-research-unveils-ceb2-cell-dynamics-in-Type-1-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Breakthrough-research-unveils-ceb2-cell-dynamics-in-Type-1-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2853d69f-dfce-4158-b752-a0636c6e17d7 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 14:17:53 -0500 Breakthrough research unveils β-cell dynamics in Type 1 diabetes
研究揭示卡介苗疫苗在对抗流感方面的意想不到的作用随着加拿大的流感季节与创纪录的 A 型链球菌病例和持续存在的 COVID-19 担忧同时发生，一项新的研究正在揭示我们对呼吸道免疫反应的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Study-reveals-BCG-vaccines-unexpected-role-in-fighting-influenza.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Study-reveals-BCG-vaccines-unexpected-role-in-fighting-influenza.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0d8d1f5-cf55-4670-8d9f-ad7b32612468 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 13:58:02 -0500 Study reveals BCG vaccine's unexpected role in fighting influenza
肠道细菌可能是某些遗传性眼病导致视力丧失的原因伦敦大学学院和莫菲尔德研究人员共同领导的一项针对小鼠的新研究发现，某些遗传性眼病导致的视力丧失可能是由肠道细菌引起的，并且可以通过抗菌药物进行治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Gut-bacteria-may-be-responsible-for-sight-loss-in-certain-inherited-eye-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Gut-bacteria-may-be-responsible-for-sight-loss-in-certain-inherited-eye-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a07a4bd6-b6a6-446e-bc64-e2f9afee7564 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 13:45:18 -0500 Gut bacteria may be responsible for sight loss in certain inherited eye diseases
了解肥胖对肝脏代谢的影响您的肝脏在新陈代谢（将食物转化为能量的生物过程）中起着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Understanding-obesitys-effects-on-liver-metabolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Understanding-obesitys-effects-on-liver-metabolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cc7a4a3-f825-437b-be69-4dbfcf0fd055 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 13:37:00 -0500 Understanding obesity's effects on liver metabolism
通过果蝇研究揭示肠道可塑性机制肠道可塑性最引人注目的例子之一可以在长期禁食的动物身上观察到，例如冬眠的动物或数月不进食的植物蛇，其肠道收缩多达 50%，但会恢复。重新喂食几天后尺寸会变大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Insights-into-gut- Plasticity-mechanisms-unveiled-through-fruit-fly-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Insights-into-gut- Plasticity-mechanisms-unveiled-through-fruit-fly-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d0ca197-9d77-4927-9ac9-a9cc955697e9 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 13:26:45 -0500 Insights into gut plasticity mechanisms unveiled through fruit fly research
革命性的干细胞培养方法产生人类中枢神经系统的完整模型密歇根大学、魏茨曼科学研究所和宾夕法尼亚大学的工程师和生物学家团队开发了第一种产生人类中枢神经系统早期阶段完整模型的干细胞培养方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Revolutionary-stem-cell-culture-method- Produces-full-model-of- human-central-nervous-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Revolutionary-stem-cell-culture-method- Produces-full-model-of- human-central-nervous-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=672a0626-7bd7-4059-b496-f09360770a1a Mon, 26 Feb 2024 13:14:01 -0500 Revolutionary stem cell culture method produces full model of human central nervous system
研究揭示了患有心脏损伤的 COVID-19 患者的早期死亡预测因素宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。入院时免疫和血栓生物标志物的激活以及它们预测 COVID-19 心脏损伤和死亡模式的能力仍不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Study-reveals-early-death-predictors-in-COVID-19-病人-with-cardiac-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Study-reveals-early-death-predictors-in-COVID-19-病人-with-cardiac-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=872fc1b1-9e35-4cdf-956d-bc2a534d1315 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 13:00:59 -0500 Study reveals early death predictors in COVID-19 patients with cardiac injury
针对无证移民的驾驶执照法与改善出生结果有关2023 年，罗德岛州、马萨诸塞州和明尼苏达州加入了越来越多的州行列，允许无证移民获得驾驶执照，前提是申请人能够提供某些文件，例如外国出生证明或护照以及当前在该州居住的证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Drivers-license-laws-for-undocumented-immigrants-linked-to-improved-birth-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Drivers-license-laws-for-undocumented-immigrants-linked-to-improved-birth-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bbf766ac-ea6a-4113-b54c-75f2f97aa9a4 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 12:52:13 -0500 Driver's license laws for undocumented immigrants linked to improved birth outcomes
